info.description:
The Faraday REST API enables you to interact with [our server](https://github.com/infobyte/faraday).
Use this API to interact or integrate with Faraday server. This page documents the REST API, with HTTP response codes and example requests and responses.
info.title: Faraday 4.2.0 API

get.description: Gets a summary of the latest executed commands

get.summary: Group Command by the field set in the group_by GET parameter.

200.description: Last executed command or an empty json

get.summary: Group Command by the field set in the group_by GET parameter.

delete.summary: Delete a group of Credential by ids.

delete.summary: Delete a group of Host by ids.

patch.summary: Delete a group of Host by ids.

get.summary: Group Host by the field set in the group_by GET parameter.

400.description: No workspace passed or group_by is not specified

get.description: Filters, sorts and groups hosts using a json with parameters. These parameters must be part of the model.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Recursive json with filters that supports operators. The json could also contain sort and group.

200.description: Returns filtered, sorted and grouped results

400.description: Invalid q was sent to the server

get.summary: Get the services of a host
Get the command impacted by a host

get.description: Gives basic info about the faraday service
Gives basic info about the faraday configuration

patch.summary: Delete a group of Service by ids.

get.summary: Group vulnerabilities by the field set in the group_by GET parameter.

400.description: No workspace passed or group_by is not specified

get.description: Get a CSV file with all vulns from a workspace
Filters, sorts and groups vulnerabilities using a json with parameters. These parameters must be part of the model.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Recursive json with filters that supports operators. The json could also contain sort and group.

200.description: Returns filtered, sorted and grouped results

400.description: Invalid q was sent to the server

get.description: Gets an attachment for a vulnerability

post.description: Creates a new attachment in the vuln

get.description: Gets a list of top users having account its uploaded vulns

delete.summary: Delete a group of VulnerabilityTemplate by ids.

patch.summary: Update a group of VulnerabilityTemplate by ids.

get.description: Filters, sorts and groups non workspaced objects using a json with parameters. These parameters must be part of the model.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Recursive json with filters that supports operators. The json could also contain sort and group.

200.description: Returns filtered, sorted and grouped results

400.description: Invalid q was sent to the server

delete.summary: Delete a group of Workspace by ids.

get.summary: Filters, sorts and groups objects using a json with parameters.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: recursive json with filters that supports operators. The json could also contain sort and group

200.description: return filtered, sorted and grouped results

400.description: invalid q was sent to the server

get.description: Use Vulns API to get all exploits available for a specific CVE-ID
